channel.title: DFS "operate" option Help!
channel.description: Okay so my goal is to make a manually operatable dfs. I need to make it where I can right click when its wielded and be able to click operate. Does anyone know how to do this, thanks?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2009, 11:01:01 am[/size][hr]still no replys?? :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2009, 11:08:31 am[/size][hr]where do i even start at??
